member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves the picture control support for the specified codec and profile.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT.Codec
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which picture control support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT.Profile
member.summary: A structure specifying the profile for which picture control support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets a boolean value indicating if the provided values are supported.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_CODEC_PICTURE_CONTROL_SUPPORT.PictureSupport
member.summary: Receives a structure representing the picture control support for the provided values.
